text:
Hello everyone,

I want to develop the mega menu like HubSpot home page. Can anyone help me ?

Hello! Could anyone explain to me a bit better how I can upload a template from local host to a production account (Design Manager)?? What is the command that I need to use in VS code to upload it? THANKS! :slightly_smiling_face:
Hi <@UJMJUNAF3> thanks for replay but this boilerplate allow us to build a single module in app but i want to build whole template for cms and use HubSpot variables there to manage content.

For this you are going to want to use CSS grid or flexbox to help you out with this. You also may need to use multiple layers of menu items.

An alternative to this is to use a flexible module to build this out VS a menu.
<https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/CLJJXGTC0> is a much better place to get an answer to that Julia. I’m not up to date on local dev so I’m not able to answer this
